name: Filling Scale Type WAER100ex/e for Carousel Operation
description:
The ex-proof electronic filling machine is designed for automatic filling of
propane/butane gas bottles, according to weight and for use in hazardous areas classified as Zone 1.
Design: for carousel installation
Automatic shut-off is electrical, by reaching the adjusted filling weight.
***************************************************************************************
The weighing computer calculates and shows the weight in kilograms, according to the SI standard.

Operating temperatures: from -20°C to +55°C
Weighing capacity: from 1 to 100 kg
Division: 100 g
Tara weight setting over keys: max. 50 kg
Filling weight setting over keys: max. 50 kg
Weighing platform dimension : 400 x 500 mm
Substructure : full electronic, without moving parts
Load cell: single point, OIML R 60, NTEP,
accuracy class 3

LPG Installation:
- filling pressure: max. 2.1 Mpa (21 bar)
- test pressure: max. 2,5 Mpa (25 bar)
- connection: AG W21,8 x 1/14" links

Compressed air installation:
- connection: pneumatic hose Ø 6mm
- operating pressure: min. 0,6 Mpa (6 bar), max. 0,8 Mpa (8 bar)
- quality: dry, oil-free, clean, according to ISO 8573.1, Class 2-3-2.

Power supply :
- voltage: 230 V
- frequency: 50-60 Hz
- consumption: 7/46 W
Power supply unit: ex-proof terminal box
Earth net: earth wire

Equipment:
**************
- pneumatic filling connection for 16mm click-on valves
- gallows (60825) with weight compensator
- pneumatic push-off device (60726) (push the filled bottle onto the conveyor)
- LPG filter type 5500 (60734)
- LPG and pneumatic hoses
- cylinder holder 7174 (60735)

- Internal memory: for saving and printing of the last 5000 filling data
- Data transfer of filling data from the scale to PC only wireless
- radio transmitter built in and antenna, both included in the delivery
(receiver, incl. antenna, software and connection cables to PC, at extra cost)
(Adapter USB 2.0/RS 232, at extra cost)
- in case of distances of more than 50m the data receiving is only possible with an amplifier, at extra cost

********************************************************************************************
scale calibrated, ready for operation
